name: local twonky server - black and video fullsize
description: On my network attached storage (nas) is a TwonkyServer Media Browser Installed (version 6.0.37). I can access it through my web browser on http://192.168.2.100:9001. this style reformat it to an black background. beside this, it shows the video in maximum availabe size in your browser. if you have any problems just let me know. for e.g. other browser urls, left style reformats cause of another version.
